review: I picked this up because i like to do a lot of streaming from my home computer to the main entertainment center and my Xbox One seems to have a problem with updating the media library in a timely manner. I've tried fixing that but it requires constant maintenance. I figured i'd try another approach with this device.It works flawlessly. I downloaded the PLEX app and installed the server component on my machine. It took about 20 minutes to set up the app once i got the stick itself set up (a very easy process just to do the stick). I was streaming in 1080p without an issue over wifi. I'm very happy with that.The stick also has several other apps available such as hbo go, netflix and hulu. I've been very impressed thus far with those functions. Be aware that it DOES require a micro USB external power source, but comes with an included adapter.
